data.text: @WarrenPies Great theory, I'm a believer as well esp one funds start flowing OUT of ESG and into traditional energy
@WarrenPies @_sem_yyc Yes. Think of what Germany goes through now

@_sem_yyc All of us in this space have been burned - losing jobs, less relevance, poor returns, etc...It is hard to imagine the good times lasting. But, Energy security is one of those things you don't value until it is threatened...Just the nature of the beast.
Excerpt from last week's @3F_Research discussing the changing secular outlook https://t.co/REAQxrnFra
